## 🎯 Classification

**Severity**: 
- [ ] **Critical** - Extension crashes, data loss, security issues
- [ ] **High** - Major feature broken, significant UX impact  
- [ ] **Medium** - Minor feature issues, cosmetic problems
- [ ] **Low** - Enhancement requests, documentation issues

**Priority**:
- [ ] **P1** - Fix immediately
- [ ] **P2** - Fix in current release
- [ ] **P3** - Fix in next release
- [ ] **P4** - Fix when time permits

**Category**:
- [ ] Activity Bar
- [ ] Installation/Setup
- [ ] Core Functionality
- [ ] Integration
- [ ] Performance
- [ ] UI/UX
- [ ] Documentation

## 📋 Bug Report Checklist

Before submitting, ensure:
- [ ] Bug title is clear and descriptive
- [ ] Reproduction steps are detailed and accurate
- [ ] Environment information is complete
- [ ] Expected vs actual behavior is clearly stated
- [ ] Severity and priority are appropriate
- [ ] Screenshots/logs are attached if relevant
- [ ] Similar bugs have been checked for duplicates
